sentences.sContent: He used his newspapers to beguile the readers into buying shares in his company.
sentences.sCn: 他利用他的报纸诱导读者购买他公司的股票。

synos.tran: 欺骗；使着迷；轻松地消磨

remMethod.val: be + guile (欺诈) → 欺骗 → 诱骗

words.tran: 欺骗的；消遣的；令人陶醉的
欺骗；使愉快地度过；迷住（beguile的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: If someone beguiles you into doing something, they trick you into doing it
